headline: How AI And Analyst Revisions Are Reframing The Story For FactSet Research Systems (FDS)
summary: FactSet Research Systems is back in focus after a trim to its modeled fair value, from US$319.00 to about US$305.24, which narrows the implied upside for the shares. That adjustment sits against a split analyst backdrop, with some targeting around US$321 on continued execution and others cutting targets to about US$210 and US$195 as they weigh AI related competitive risks. As you read on, you will see how these moving targets fit into a broader story you can track over time. Stay updated as...
